hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
df -k |grep -E "Used|var/lib"
#rm -rf /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/SNAPBuildBitstreams* #rm -rf /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/GenWQE* #rm -rf /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/BuildGenWQE* #rm -rf /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/*/donut #rm -rf /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/SNAP_CFG_SIM
# delete files older than nn days
# #find /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/*/builds/* -ctime "+5" -delete #find /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/* -ctime "+5" -delete$ cd /data/SNAP_Images echo "Before cleaning:" du -sh * du -sh find /data/SNAP_Images/AD9V3_missing/* -ctime "+60" -delete #find /data/SNAP_Images/S121B_missing/* -ctime "+30" -delete #find /data/SNAP_Images/N250SP_missing/* -ctime "+60" -delete find /data/SNAP_Images/S241_missing/* -ctime "+30" -delete find /data/SNAP_Images/FX609_missing/* -ctime "+30" -delete find /data/SNAP_Images/RCXVUP_missing/* -ctime "+30" -delete find /data/SNAP_Images/card_not_avail/* -ctime "+60" -delete find /data/SNAP_Images/AD9V3_FACTORY_MCS/* -ctime "+30" -delete #find /data/SNAP_Images/N250SP_FACTORY_MCS/* -ctime "+30" -delete find /data/SNAP_Images/no_test_required/* -ctime "+30" -delete echo "After cleaning:" du -sh * du- sh
# rm -f /data/SNAP_Images/AD9V3_missing/* # rm -f /data/SNAP_Images/S121B_missing/* # rm -f /data/SNAP_Images/N250SP_missing/* # rm -f /data/SNAP_Images/S241_missing/* # rm -f /data/SNAP_Images/FX609_missing/* # rm -f /data/SNAP_Images/RCXVUP_missing/* # rm -f /data/SNAP_Images/card_not_avail/* #rm -rf /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/SNAP_IMG_TEST_matrix/configurations/axis-ACT/hls_scatter_gather/axis-CRD_CL/ADKU3_nCL/builds/666/log #rm -rf /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/SNAP_IMG_TEST_matrix/configurations/axis-ACT/ #find /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/SNAP_SIM_matrix/configurations/axis-ACT/* -ctime "+7" -delete #find /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/SNAP_IMG_TEST_matrix/configurations/axis-ACT/* -ctime "+7" -delete #find /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/SNAP_IMG_TEST_matrix/configurations/axis-ACT/hdl_helloworld/axis-CRD_CL/ADKU3_nCL/builds/739 -delete #find /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/SNAP_IMG_TEST_matrix/configurations/axis-ACT/hdl_example.BRAM/axis-CRD_CL/AD8K5_nCL/builds/739 -delete
#rm -rf /afs/vlsilab.boeblingen.ibm.com/proj/fpga/framework/CI_ws/SNAP_IMG_CAPI2_matrix/repaired_hls_mk/* #rm -rf /afs/vlsilab.boeblingen.ibm.com/proj/fpga/framework/CI_ws/SNAP_IMG_CAPI2_matrix/* #rm -rf /afs/vlsilab.boeblingen.ibm.com/proj/fpga/framework/CI_ws/OC_SIM_matrix/* #rm -rf /afs/vlsilab.boeblingen.ibm.com/proj/fpga/framework/CI_ws/SNAP_IMG_CAPI2_matrix/correct_hls_mk/*
